name: Turbo Pizza
storyline: Rebecca and Robert are on a quest to build a successful pizza restaurant! In this amazing game, you have full control over their pizza restaurant destiny. You can purchase new appliances, upgrade menu options and add new, or put resources on developing Rebecca and Roberts business skills. Collect your money and open a second location in an even MORE unique setting. Learn your customers needs and word of mouth will bring the masses. Remember that different customers have different needs. Build your own successful business in this fun and fast management game!
summary: Casual game, where the player controls the waitress and takes orders from customers and fullfils them. Game has a lot of challenging levels and you can customize/upgrage your pizza place.
